characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Max
characters.description1: A "fabulous" magician famed for his aerial illusions. Accused of murder.

characters.name: Regina Berry
characters.description1: The idol of the Berry Big Circus and daughter to Russel Berry, the Ringmaster.

characters.name: Russell Berry
characters.description1: The victim and Ringmaster of the Berry Big Circus. Regina Berry's father.

characters.name: Ben
characters.description1: Real Name: Benjamin Woodman. A ventriloquist. Conversing with him is really tiring.
characters.description2: Real Name: Benjamin Woodman. Without his puppet Trilo, Ben won't say much.

characters.name: Moe
characters.description1: Real Name: Lawrence Curls. The Ringmaster's old friend, a pleasant stooge of a clown.

characters.name: Acro
characters.description1: Real Name: Ken Dingling. A star acrobat currently undergoing rehabilitation.
characters.description2: Real Name: Ken Dingling. Seriously injured both legs while training six months ago.

characters.name: Bat
characters.description1: Real Name: Sean Dingling. Bit on the head six months ago by Léon. Still in a coma.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: A picture of the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Silk Hat
evidences.description1: Made-to-order fedora that is a symbol of Max's fabulousness. Found at the crime scene.

evidences.name: Max G. Promo Poster
evidences.obtained: Received from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Emblazoned with Max's three famous symbols. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Ringmaster's Papers
evidences.obtained: Received from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Documents related to Max's salary negotiations. He got an enormous raise 1 week ago.

evidences.name: Circus Map
evidences.description1: A map of the Berry Big Circus. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Broken Bottle
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Cafeteria.
evidences.description1: An orange juice bottle that was found broken on the cafeteria floor.

evidences.name: Trilo Quist
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: A ventriloquist's puppet. An operatic tenor who doubles as Ben's sidekick.

evidences.name: Money the Monkey
evidences.description1: A monkey who takes care of Acro. Habitually gathers all sorts of shiny objects.

evidences.name: Ring
evidences.description1: A cheap ring with an eerie sparkle. "From T to R" is engraved on it.

evidences.name: Russell's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Time of death: 10:15 PM. Cause: Blunt force trauma to the back of the head.

evidences.name: Wooden Box
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: The victim was hunched over this 20 lb. box. It was locked by a small key.

evidences.name: Small Seasoning Bottle
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Found inside the Wooden Box the victim was hunched over. It contains pepper.

evidences.name: Grand Prix Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of Max's Award Ceremony. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Max G. Bust
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Cafeteria.
evidences.description1: Bronze statue taken from the cafeteria before the crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Note
evidences.obtained: Received from Moe.  → Retrieved from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Posted in the Cafeteria on the day of the crime, then torn. States: "To The Murderer!"
evidences.description2: Torn by Ringmaster, found in his tailcoat pocket. Click here for details.
evidences.description3: Found in Regina's pocket on the morning of crime. Click here for details.
evidences.description4: Placed by Acro in Regina's pocket on morning of crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Stage Costume
evidences.description1: A shiny spangled vest. It's not Maya's size at all.

evidences.name: Léon
evidences.description1: The animal show's lion. Shot by the Ringmaster six months ago for biting a performer.

evidences.name: Scarf
evidences.description1: Bat's scarf. Stained with his blood and a small quantity of pepper.
